sentences.sContent: There is a tendency to externalize all religions.
sentences.sCn: 存在把一切宗教都视为仅具外表形式的倾向。

sentences.sContent: When you think of a “life without limits” you have a tendency to think that you can do anything.
sentences.sCn: 当你思考“生命没有限制”的时候，你会有一种倾向，觉得自己能做任何事情。

sentences.sContent: We have a tendency to think that everything is about us.
sentences.sCn: 我们有一种倾向，认为任何事都要围着我们转。

words.tran: 有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的

remMethod.val: tend(趋向) ＋ ency(表状态) → 倾向， 趋向

trans.tranOther: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it
